name: Covering Distance
tagline: one step (or checkin) at a time
body:
### What this is ...
At some point in the future, this is destined to be the online home of Shawn Zeller.  At the moment, [my LinkedIn profile](http://www.linkedin.com/in/szeller) is probably the best place to see what I'm up to and try to contact me.

### When I'm not in the office

I'm probably either
* out running
* reading comic books  
* or helping my wife out with [her latest venture](http://pookismahi.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
